name: Tennis Elbow Manager
description:
Become A Tennis Coach !
In this tennis manager game, you take control of a tennis coach and his player, and your goal is to reach the Number One ranking in the world, to stay there as long as possible and win as many Grand Slam titles as possible.Features:
  • Men or Women Tour
  • 3500 players evolving other 38 years, from 1990 to 2027
  • More than 300 tournaments
  • World Team Cup and Masters Cup
  • Singles & doubles
  • Up to 4 coached players
  • 5 difficulty levels
  • Full ranking system (like the entry one from ATP)

Important Note:
You do not play tennis in Tennis Elbow Manager : it's a manager game., matches are seen only by their scores and events.
